metadata.title: CVE-2017-17788 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
In GIMP 2.8.22, there is a stack-based buffer over-read in xcf_load_stream in app/xcf/xcf.c when there is no '\0' character after the version string.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-17788` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gimp - 2.8.22-1
gimp-data - 2.8.22-1
libgimp2.0 - 2.8.22-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gimp package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.22-1').
